application_process.description: Submit Application for Original Contractor License with $450 fee (includes initial exam fee). Submit Certification of Work Experience forms documenting 4 years.
CSLB reviews application - nearly half are returned incomplete. Ensure accuracy!
Live Scan fingerprinting for DOJ/FBI background check after application accepted.
Schedule Law & Business + C-36 Trade exams with PSI once approved.
Submit $25,000 contractor bond and workers' comp insurance (REQUIRED for C-36).
License issued upon passing exams and meeting all requirements. Renew every 2 years.

common_pitfalls: Submitting incomplete applications - #1 cause of delays
Not documenting full 4 years of qualifying experience properly
Forgetting workers comp insurance BEFORE license can be issued
Not understanding RME requires PERMANENT employment (not 1099 contractor)
Thinking expunged convictions won't show - they WILL appear on background check

examination.books_required: California Contractors License Law & Reference Book, California code books

insurance_bonding.insurance_required: Workers' compensation REQUIRED for C-36 even with no employees
insurance_bonding.liability_minimum: For LLC: $1M minimum (5 or fewer personnel), up to $5M

license_types.description: Installation, alteration, repair of pipes, fittings, fixtures for sanitary drainage, water supply, fire protection systems
license_types.experience_required: 4 years journeyman-level or higher within last 10 years
license_types.name: C-36 Plumbing Contractor

pro_tips: Nearly HALF of all applications are returned incomplete - take time to fill out completely!
C-36 Plumbing REQUIRES workers' comp even with zero employees - plan for this cost
If using RME as qualifier, they need their OWN $25K bond PLUS you need contractor bond
Study materials are FREE on CSLB website - don't pay for exam prep claiming CSLB affiliation
You have 18 months to pass both exams after application approval - use the time wisely

reciprocity.requirements: Must hold current license in same classification in another recognized state. Trade exam may be waived. Law & Business still required if not passed in last 5 years.
reciprocity.states_accepted: Check CSLB website for recognized states/classifications

requirements.citizenship: Not required - SSN or ITIN required for tax purposes
requirements.education: May grant up to 3 years credit toward 4-year requirement for accredited school/apprenticeship training
requirements.experience: 4 years of journeyman-level experience in the classification within the last 10 years
